ygData.subject: Re: spare runes for trade on Bristlebain
ygData.msgSnippet: Congratulations Robert! As a budding Wizard, I am curious where you happened upon the runes necessary to make Pillar of Fire? I ve been searching all over for
ygData.messageBody:
Congratulations Robert!

As a budding Wizard, I am curious where you happened upon the runes necessary to make Pillar of Fire? I've been searching all over for them and as yet no luck.

Trev

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Davis [SMTP:rob.davis@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 7:30 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] spare runes for trade on Bristlebain


Hello all,

I now have two runes of Substance on Bristlebain. I would like to swap one for
Falhalem or Periphery. If you would like to trade do a /tell to Fuzboo and
let's meet somewhere.

I made my first spell yesterday . Popped two runes into the lexicon, hit
combine, and was the proud owner of Pillar of Fire. I scribed it to my own
spell book, so I can't say yet if they're tradeable.

Robert Davis







rob.davis@...
http://oma.hypermart.net/personal.htm
